Description: Princeton Estates, an apartment rental community in Temple Hills, Maryland, has one, two and three bedroom apartments. Our affordable for rent apartments feature a variety of floor plans with washer and dryers. Our apartments are conveniently located within minutes of the National Harbor, shopping, I-495, and I-295. Contact us today to learn more!

Description: Gateway Square on St. Barnabas Road in Temple Hills, MD offers spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit is at your doorstep – MetroBus D12 stops here to Suitland and Southern Avenue MetroRail stations. 5 minutes to Suitland Parkway, I-295 and the Woodrow Wilson Bridge. 5-10 minutes to Rivertowne Commons, Marlow Heights Shopping Center and 100’s of other stores, restaurants and services. 10 minutes to Suitland Federal Center, Joint Base Andrews & Bolling, the National Harbor, and Tanger Outlets. 5-10 minutes to Hillcrest Heights Community Center, North Barnaby Splash Park, Henson Creek Trail, Oxon Hill Farm, and Tucker Road Ice Rink & Community Center. Apartment amenities include a spacious living area with room for lots of storage, a relaxing covered balcony or patio, large kitchen with huge breakfast bar, windows throughout (we provide blinds), and central heat and air conditioning. Gas and electricity are included in your rent – you pay water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing swimming pool with sundeck, play area, basketball court, recycling areas, laundry in most buildings, mail delivery in each building, on-site management and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.gatewaysquare.net.

Description: If youre talking about apartments in Temple Hills, MD, the conversation has to begin with Marlow Plaza Apartments. Where else are you going to have your choice of garden-style or high-rise pet-friendly apartment homes, in spacious one-, two- or three-bedroom floor plans. Wait, it gets even better! Select one of our well-designed, strikingly renovated residences and enjoy the modern style and contemporary comfort of an updated kitchen and bath. At this point, youre probably thinking that if you were living in such an apartment youd never want to leave, and youd be right except for the time youll want to spend walking to abundant shopping, dining and entertainment, hopping on the Metro into downtown DC or taking the Beltway anywhere you want to go. Heres an idea: instead of just talking about these distinctive apartments in Temple Hills, come tour one today!

Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
No aggressive breeds. 
* $350 Fee
* 25 lb Weight Limit
Description: It seems like youve been having this dream forever. Youre living in this incredible apartment in Temple Hills, MD. The one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments were all spacious, but you immediately fell in love with the two-bedroom. Youre relaxing in the living room with your dinner guests, basking in their compliments on the gourmet meal you just prepared in the modern kitchen of your newly renovated apartment. The conversation turns to the latest shopping and dining experiences and how wonderful it is that theyre all just minutes away, followed by a friendly debate over which of the neighborhoods two Metro stations is more convenient. Finally, plans are made to meet at the pool tomorrow and they depart. Thats when you wake up and realize it wasnt a dream at all. Its your life, today and every day, at Marlow Heights Apartments in Temple Hills, MD.
